actions.committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

official_title: A bill to amend the Family and Medical Leave Act of 1993 to allow employees to take parental involvement leave to participate in or attend the educational activities of their children.

summary.text: Strengthen Families, Strengthen Education Act - Amends the Family and Medical Leave Act of 1993 to allow employees covered by such Act to take up to four hours during any 30-day period, and up to 24 hours during any 12-month period, of parental involvement leave to participate in or attend academic, school-sponsored activities attended by their children. Amends Federal civil service law to apply the same parental involvement leave allowance to Federal employees.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Family and Medical Leave Act of 1993 to allow employees to take parental involvement leave to participate in or attend the educational activities of their children.
